title: multicraft模组崩溃
author: 我的世界愤怒了
txt_content:
multicraft模组端崩溃。01.11 22:12:02 [Multicraft] Server stopped
01.11 22:12:02 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1
01.11 22:12:02 [Multicraft] Server shut down
01.11 22:12:02 [Server] INFO Error: Unable to access jarfile \jar\cauldron-1.7.2-1.1147.04.90-server
01.11 22:12:02 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "cauldron-1.7.2-1.1147.04.90-server"
别扯些没用的。。。。

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
Multicraft在你设置的路径找不到服务器开服的核心文件
\jar\cauldron-1.7.2-1.1147.04.90-server

检查路径以及文件名称

replies.author: 我的世界愤怒了
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2015-11-1 22:38
Multicraft在你设置的路径找不到服务器开服的核心文件
\jar\cauldron-1.7.2-1.1147.04.90-server
版主大大都来了?(?? _ ?? ?)，我明明装了2333
